document.full_text: kraft foods inc  said on monday its chief financial officer will step down in mid-2011 and be replaced by the executive who oversees the food maker's operations.
document.title: kraft cfo to step down; operations exec to take job
lines_and_colors: kraft foods inc  said on monday its chief financial officer will step down in mid-2011 and be replaced by the executive who oversees the food maker's operations.
